article_title: Source of rare bacterial infection at Upstate hospital still being sought
article_text: Surgical equipment has been implicated in a rare bacterial infection that contributed to the death of one patient and sickened 13 others at Greenville Memorial Hospital over the past three months, officials confirmed Friday.
